Event.name: Product_delivery
Event.definition: <def-root>In order to facilitate the purchase of <fen>Goods</fen> which start off in a location distant from a <fen>Purchaser</fen>, a <fen>Deliverer</fen> transports and hands off the <fen>Goods</fen> to a <fen>Purchaser</fen> or (more indirectly) a <fen>Goal</fen> location which is accessible to the <fen>Purchaser</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Deliverer
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the person who completes the movement of the <fen>Goods</fen> after having transported it. </def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition: <def-root>The end of the path and intended goal of the sending. </def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Goods</fen> or the <fen>Deliverer</fen> during the action. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the delivery event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). It may also indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Deliverer</fen> that affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).</def-root>

Arg.name: Purchaser
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual who purchases and receives the <fen>Goods</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Deliverer</fen> hopes to bring about by delivering to the <fen>Purchaser</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>A state-of-affairs that explains why the <fen>Goods</fen> were delivered.</def-root>

Arg.name: Cotheme
Arg.definition: <def-root>An additional theme delivered along with the main <fen>Goods</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Container
Arg.definition: <def-root>A container in which the <fen>Goods</fen> is delivered. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location at which the delivery takes place. </def-root>

Arg.name: Speed
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Speed</fen> at which the <fen>Deliverer</fen> delivers the <fen>Goods</fen>.
<ex>This service is for our clients who need <fex name="spe">speedy</fex> <t>delivery</t> of their goods.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The conditions under which the delivery takes place.
<ex>Purchases over $400 are <t>delivered</t> for free.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location of the <fen>Goods</fen> before the delivery process begins. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The intermediate actions performed by the <fen>Deliverer</fen> in order to move the <fen>Goods</fen> to the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Path
Arg.definition: <def-root>The path along which the <fen>Goods</fen> move while being delivered. </def-root>
